meanings.definition: The final stage of cell division in which the chromosomes move to opposite ends of the cell.
meanings.sent1: During telophase, the chromosomes separate to opposite sides.
meanings.sent2: In telophase, the cell prepares for division by moving the chromosomes apart.
meanings.sent3: The chromosomes in telophase decided to play a game of tug-of-war.
meanings.sent4: Telophase is like the grand finale of a fireworks show, with chromosomes spreading out like sparks.
meanings.sent5: I imagined telophase as a race where the chromosomes rush to the finish line at opposite ends of the cell.
